ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to apply a [url='http://www.scichart.com/todo']MeshColorPalette to the [url='http://www.scichart.com/todo']SurfaceMeshRenderableSeries3D[/url] type.
Color Palettes support Linear Gradient Brush with Linear Interpolated or Stepped palettes, with or without contours. You can also create your own palette by applying a Linear Gradient Brush to the chart
This versatile type allows rendering of 3D surfaces / terrain / grids which could be used for visualizing Topology data, Statistical analysis, Volatility Smiles etc...
